name: Cardboard Games - Ammunization
description:
Before playing: When the game loads up make sure to select the weapons you want to take with you into the levels.

Controls:

  1. Left mouse click - Fire
  2. Space - Dash
  3. WASD/Keypad - Movement
  4. ESC - Pause/Resume

Feel free to leave feedback on our website. You may also visit our group twitter as we will be adding more about the development of the game here.
